title: Game-Based Learning Environment Design for Scientific Inquiry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and laboratory safety regulations
context.additional_context: Learners access a virtual science lab using personal devices and experience the scientific inquiry process through gamified elements. They develop the ability to solve real-life scientific problems through collaboration and problem-solving in VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can perform three or more scientific experiment procedures without errors in a VR-based simulation
Learners can analyze complex scientific problems and derive solutions through a gamified quest system
Learners can provide effective feedback using scientific communication skills in collaborative games with peers
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
